Academics

Degrees and Programs
The university offers more than 70 traditional baccalaureate and master's degree programs, education credential and certificate programs, and a doctoral program.

Certificates
Credentials
Course Catalog / Bulletin

Centers & Institutes
CSUSB maintains a number of officially recognized Institutes and Centers with each of them focusing on leveraging faculty, staff, and student expertise for the benefit of the region we serve.

List of all Campus Centers
List of all Campus Institutes















Research
CSUSB offers a number of institutes and centers to facilitate, support and provide resources for students and faculty mentors with the goal of publication, presentation, performance, or exhibition of the results or products.

Assessment & Research, Office of

Institutional Research
Institutional Review Board
Learning Research Institute
